room_title: Escape room "Mysterious Temple" by Out Of Time Escape in Charlotte
review: This was our first trip to Out Of Time and it was so much fun! The temple room was great and you had to work as a team so everyone was involved!! We were there with some friends to celebrate our daughters sweet 16! Will definitely be back!!

room_title: Escape room "Mysterious Temple" by Out Of Time Escape in Charlotte
review: Great time and excellent support staff! It was a teen birthday party and we did the Amazon Temple room. Very well done and awesome set up. Hints were spot on.

room_title: Escape room "Mysterious Temple" by Out Of Time Escape in Charlotte
review: We celebrated two birthdays on our visit. We could not have been happier to have chosen the Temple Room as our first ever escape room. Corey was super personable and helpful and made our experience even more incredible. Looking forward to tackling more rooms in the future. We will definitely recommend this to our friends!
